author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:

Adding 2018 production-like workflows to relvals.

#### PR validation:

Workflow 1304.18 runs out-of-box locally. The 1304.181 will need another PR (back port of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26325)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26365
title: add 2018 Prod-like workflow w & w/o bParking
